# psyphr

suite of R packages to wrangle, visualize, and analyze psychophysiological data.

This is the legacy repository for `psyphr`. Please visit our GitHub organization, [`psyphr-dev`](https://github.com/psyphr-dev), to learn about the latest tidy tools for psychophysiological data and to post issues, comments, or questions. We would like to hear from you.
